taxon_identification.name_authority_date: Sporobolus compositus var. drummondii (Trin.) Kartesz & Gandhi

bio:treatment.description: Plants not rhizomatous. Culms slender, 1-2(2.5) mm thick at the base. Uppermost sheaths 0.8-2.5 mm wide. Panicles with 16-36 spikelets per cm2 when pressed. Fruits 1.1-1.7 mm.
bio:treatment.discussion: Sporobolus compositus var. drummondii is most abundant in Kansas, Oklahoma, and Texas.
